data.name: Lightphobe
data.detailed_description:
Lightphobe is a unique asymmetrical PVP game that pits Soldiers against creatures known as Lightphobes. Such creatures are sensitive to a special type of light, and will mutate into a vulnerable state when exposed to such light. It is only in this vulnerable state when these creatures can be damaged and killed.

Soldiers


Play as a Soldier for a fluid FPS experience that focuses on quick aiming and acute awareness of your surroundings.

Work as a team to strategize and launch an insurmountable defence against the onslaught of Lightphobes!

Lightphobes


Play as a Lightphobe to experience a fluid third-person perspective that focuses on quick maneuvering and exploitation of weak-spots in the Soldiers' defences.

Coordinate a plan of attack with other Lightphobe players for the best chance of success!



Wishlist now on Steam!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2.4 GHz or AMD Dual-Core Athlon 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 / AMD Radeon RX 560 with 2 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10400 or AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 / AMD Radeon RX 5500 XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: A fast and stable internet connection is recommended.
